welcomelegalai: Transform legal workflows with AI-driven solutions that automate the summarization and classification of legal documents, enhancingaccuracy and efficiency.
hs: Hello, Search your Documents with powerful RAG
hsd: The Document Search feature combines semantic and full-text search to help users find the most relevant legal documents,even if they don’t use exact keywords. It applies filters,removes weak documents, and gives fast, accurate results using AI — making legal research simple and effective.
dsd: Easily access and search your legal, academic, or project documents in one click.

summarization.title: Summarization
summarization.heading: Summarize your Documents.
summarization.description: Automatically generate concise summaries of long legal documents.

classification.title: Classification
classification.heading: Classify your Documents.
classification.description: Automatically assign categories to legal texts using AI.

search.title: Search
search.heading: Advance Document Search.
search.description: Use smart filters and semantic search to find documents faster.

entity.title: Entity Extraction
entity.heading: Extract Entities of Documents.
entity.description: Identify names, places, and organizations from legal texts.

metadata.title: Metadata Extraction
metadata.heading: Extract Metadata of Documents.
metadata.description: Extract document metadata like date, author, case type.

textvoice.title: Text to Voice Support
textvoice.heading: Text to Voice of Documents.
textvoice.description: Convert legal text to speech for better accessibility.

langsupport.title: Language Support
langsupport.heading: Language Translation.
langsupport.description: Translate legal content across multiple languages.

readMore.title: Legal AI Development Process
readMore.shortDescription: In the legal sector, handling large volumes of documents is a routine but essential task. Legal practitioners, researchers, and even clients frequently deal with extensive paperwork that demands careful review and analysis. However, this manual process is time-consuming, prone to errors, and can lead to inefficiencies within the legal workflow. Our solution aims to address these challenges through the power of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.
readMore.fullDescription: Our AI-based service specializes in summarizing and classifying legal documents to streamline legal processes. By leveraging advanced machine learning (ML) techniques, we have developed tools that assist legal professionals in managing information overload, improving accuracy, and enhancing workflow efficiency.

name: Name
welcome_message_with_placeholder: {{legalAI}} is the future of legal tech
